title: When can I make A PBE Acc????
body: I really want to know when can i make a PBE acc?

replies.body: For the moment pbe signups are closed for some maintenance. We're working on making the pbe signup process a little smoother and easier for you guys! Be sure to check the [**PBE Status Page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) to see when it's back up. Also check out this [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ) for all the details if you're new to the whole pbe process.
